info.description: This is the documentation of Maribooru's API
info.title: Maribooru

externalDocs.description: Find out more about our store

get.description: To get user by their ID. ID is placed as URL parameter
To get all users with keywords. Keywords, Offset, Limit, and Sort are placed as query parameters.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Keywords to filter users by their username. Show all if empty.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit results to N results. Currently hardcoded to 50 if empty. Might be changed in future to be configurable.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to start from. If empty, will always 0.

parameters.name: is_admin
parameters.description: Show only admins. If empty, show all users.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by column. If empty, sort by username. For all available keywords, see the [API docs](https://maribooru.hiyo.run/docs#section/Sorting).

post.description: POST with body of username or email and password in JSON. It will return a JWT token in the data field as a string.

200.description: User signed in successfully, got the JWT for signing in.

post.description: POST with body of username, email (optional, unless forced from the settings), and password in JSON. It will return a JWT token in the message field as a string, while returning user's detail in the data field.

200.description: User signed up successfully, got the JWT for signing in, returned user's detail.

post.description: This endpoint will only work when Maribooru is first set up. Basically the same as sign-up but registered user will be assigned as the first admin. Also returns a JWT token in the message field as a string, while returning admin's detail in the data field. When admin is already set up, returns code forbidden.

200.description: Admin registered successfully, got the JWT for signing in.

post.summary: Change password of currently signed in user
post.description: POST with body of old password and new password in JSON. It will return current user's detail in the data field.

get.description: Get currently signed in user's detail. It will return current user's detail in the data field.

400.description: You need to be signed in

401.description: You need to be signed in

put.description: PUT with body of username and email in JSON. If field is empty string, value will be ignored. It will return updated user's detail in the data field.

delete.description: Delete currently signed in user. Returns empty data field and status code 200.

post.description: POST with body of username, email (optional, unless forced from the settings), and password in JSON. It will return a JWT token in the message field as a string, while returning user's detail in the data field.

200.description: Admin created successfully, got the JWT for signing in, returned admin's detail.

get.description: To get all admins with keywords. Keywords, Offset, Limit, and Sort are placed as query parameters.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit results to N results. Currently hardcoded to 50 if empty. Might be changed in future to be configurable.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to start from. If empty, will always 0.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Name to filter admins by. Show all if empty.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by column. If empty, sort by username. For all available keywords, see the [API docs](https://maribooru.hiyo.run/docs#section/Sorting).

put.summary: Assign an existing user as admin
put.description: Provide the user id in the path. It will return user's administrator detail in the data field.

200.description: User assigned as admin, returned admin's detail

400.description: You need to provide a valid user id on the path

delete.description: Provide the user id you want to unassign from admin in the path.

put.description: Endpoint to allow admin to update a user's details

get.description: Get the user permissions, passing the user's id on the URL parameter
To get all tags categories with keywords. Keywords, Offset, Limit, and Sort are placed as query parameters.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit results to N results. Currently hardcoded to 50 if empty. Might be changed in future to be configurable.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to start from. If empty, will always 0.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Name to filter tag categories by. Show all if empty.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by column. If empty, sort by name. For all available keywords, see the [API docs](https://maribooru.hiyo.run/docs#section/Sorting).

200.description: Got all the tag categories, paged.

get.description: Get a tag category by ID

delete.description: Delete a tag category by ID

get.description: To get all tags with keywords. Keywords, Offset, Limit, and Sort are placed as query parameters.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit results to N results. Currently hardcoded to 50 if empty. Might be changed in future to be configurable.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: The offset to start from. If empty, will always 0.

parameters.name: keywords
parameters.description: Name to filter tags by. Show all if empty.

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Sort by column. If empty, sort by name. For all available keywords, see the [API docs](https://maribooru.hiyo.run/docs#section/Sorting).
